tweet_text: @DouglasPhunny That was going to be my next point. I think it’s all about perspective & what is tolerable because after reading the article, I saw it totally different. I’m also not married, but I know my partner gets me. we’ve had convos specifically about this article’s topic.

tweet_text: @lesliealexxia Tied with Halloween II for best opening of the entire franchise. I love how II upgrades the old theme and how IV uses no music at all. Two entirely different ways of creating mood and tension and they work perfectly.
text_en: Tied with Halloween II for best opening of the entire franchise. I love how II upgrades the old theme and how IV uses no music at all. Two entirely different ways of creating mood and tension and they work perfectly.
